meanings.definition: Small worms that live in glaciers.
meanings.sent1: The iceworms wriggled happily in the cold glacier.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study iceworms to learn about life in extreme conditions.
meanings.sent3: The iceworms threw a snowball party in their icy home.
meanings.sent4: The iceworms are like tiny explorers in the frozen world.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering iceworms added a touch of magic to the glacier.

meanings.definition: A type of worm that thrives in icy environments.
meanings.sent1: The iceworms burrowed deep into the icy ground to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: In the Arctic, iceworms are an important part of the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The iceworms held a chilly dance party under the northern lights.
meanings.sent4: The iceworms are like nature's cold-weather champions.
meanings.sent5: The glittering iceworms sparkled like diamonds in the snow.
